title: Work
text:
I have worked at my first company, Rocket Path PC, for almost 5 years.

Despite my background in React, I initially learned Drupal and PHP on the job. I contributed to several e-commerce websites and independently managed the development of numerous presentation websites, which helped solidify my styling skills using SCSS and jQuery. Eventually, I established the styling and assisted with the initial structure for our Drupal template, automating tasks to prevent starting from scratch with each new project.

Taking charge of the HTML landing pages delivery, I optimized the process saving significant time. The positive client feedback led to more projects, resulting in the successful and punctual delivery of numerous pages.

For the past 2.5 years I've been a part of the React team, where we developed decoupled e-commerce websites with Next.js. I quickly adapted to the new environment, understanding the concepts with minimal guidance. Additionally, I proposed improvements for our workflow, for cleaner & reusable code and and contributed to improving site performance.
